myVelib.Card

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • myVelib.Card.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoCard, VLIBRE_Card, VMAX_Card

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class for Card has three subclasses for VLIBRE, VMAX cards and No card.
